short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and modern dictionary, right in your browser. Just click the icon to search up a word!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Dictionary made by PixelApps, your new go-to dictionary extension for your Chrome browser! Our extension offers a sleek and modern design that makes looking up definitions a breeze. With just one click on the Dictionary icon, you can easily search for any English word and get its definition in a matter of seconds.

Our team at PixelApps understands the importance of having a reliable dictionary tool, which is why we've developed an extension that is both fast and efficient. Say goodbye to spending valuable time browsing through multiple tabs and searching for the right definition. With Dictionary, everything you need is right at your fingertips.

But that's not all - we're constantly improving and expanding our services to provide you with an even better experience. We understand that language learning is not limited to just one language, and we want to cater to the needs of our users. That's why we're excited to announce that we will soon be expanding our services to include more languages!

In the meantime, we would love to hear from you about which language you'd like us to add next. Our team is always listening to feedback and striving to improve our extension to meet the needs of our users. So, leave your suggestion in the reviews, and we'll do our best to include it in our upcoming updates.

In conclusion, if you're looking for a reliable, fast, and modern-looking dictionary extension for your Chrome browser, look no further than Dictionary by PixelApps. Download our extension today and experience the convenience of having a high-quality dictionary tool right at your fingertips.
